body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Blue Ridge Auto Group. My name is Gregory Diaz. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Gregory, my name is Kathleen Evans.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. To assist you further, could you please provide the last four digits of your phone number and the model of the car you are inquiring about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the last four digits of my phone number are seven five two one, and I am inquiring about the blue sedan model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Kathleen. We will look into the shipping details for the blue sedan model. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I'm very excited about purchasing the car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kathleen. Thank you for your time and for choosing Blue Ridge Auto Group. We will get back to you soon with the shipping information. Have a wonderful day!
